notes.text:
This update for openldap2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-25692: Fixed an unauthenticated remote denial of service due to incorrect validation of modrdn equality rules (bsc#1178387).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A NULL pointer dereference was found in OpenLDAP server and was fixed in openldap 2.4.55, during a request for renaming RDNs. An unauthenticated attacker could remotely crash the slapd process by sending a specially crafted request, causing a Denial of Service.
